Supply <br> $\$ 0.00$: Cost of electricity from supplier or Standard Service. This cost is not regulated, but is based on competitive procurement and dependent on usage.
Transmission <br> $\$ 0.00$: Cost to maintain high voltage towers and lines. Regulated by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission. This charge is dependent on usage.
Local Delivery <br> $\$ 9.62$: Cost of Eversource to build, maintain, and repair the poles, lines, and meters that deliver power from the substation. Regulated by PURA.
Public Benefits <br> $\$ 0.00$: Cost to support energy programs authorized by the state. This charge is dependent on usage.
